003
004package mkt.model;
005
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import mkt.Model;
008
009/** Fix quantum model */
010public class Qfix {
011  static double downGap (double jmp, double lgJmp, double q) {
012    return Math.pow(jmp, Math.round(Math.log(q)/lgJmp) - 1);
013  }
014
015  static double upGap (double jmp, double lgJmp, double q) {
016    return Math.pow(jmp, Math.round(Math.log(q)/lgJmp) + 1);
017  }
018
019  static double downGap2 (double jmp, double q, double ref) {
020    double ref2 = ref * jmp;
021    return ref2 * Math.sqrt(jmp) >= q ? ref : downGap2(jmp, q, ref2);
022  }
023
024  static double upGap2 (double jmp, double q, double ref) {
025    double ref2 = ref / jmp;
026    return ref2 / Math.sqrt(jmp) <= q ? ref : upGap2(jmp, q, ref2);
027  }
028
029  /**
030   * Constructor.
031   * @return InvModel
032   */
033  public static Model mk () {
034    return new Model(
035      "QFIJO",
036      "Quantum fijo",
037      new String[]{"Intervalo"},
038      new int[]{Model.PERC_PARAM},
039      (closes, params) -> {
040        double jmp = params[0] + 1;
041        double lgJmp = Math.log(jmp);
042
043        double[] cls0 = closes[0];
044        int ncos = cls0.length;
045        int ndates = closes.length;
046
047        double[][] allRefs = new double[ndates][ncos];
048
049        double[] refs = new double[ncos];
050        for (int i = 0; i < ncos; ++i)
051          refs[i] = Math.pow(jmp, Math.round(Math.log(cls0[i])/lgJmp) - 1) / jmp;
052
053        allRefs[0] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
054        for (int idate = 1; idate < ndates; ++idate) {
055          double[] closesR = closes[idate];
056          double[] prvCloses = closes[idate - 1];
057
058          for (int ico = 0; ico < ncos; ++ico) {
059            double q0 = prvCloses[ico];
060            double ref = refs[ico];
061            double q = closesR[ico];
062
063            if (q0 <= ref) {
064              if (q < q0) {
065                refs[ico] = upGap2(jmp, q, ref);
066              } else if (q > ref) {
067                refs[ico] = downGap(jmp, lgJmp, q);
068              }
069            } else {
070              if (q > q0) {
071                refs[ico] = downGap2(jmp, q, ref);
072              } else if (q <= ref) {
073                refs[ico] = upGap(jmp, lgJmp, q);
074              }
075            }
076          }
077          allRefs[idate] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
078        }
079        return allRefs;
080      }
081    );
082  }
083}
